title: Start
body:
Emma can you get me something in the cellar?

yeah

*door closes*

Hey, the door won't open. 
Hello? father? the door's stuck

It's not stuck
Emma it's time. 

No! Let me out!
...But, the harvest this year
I thought we made more than we did last year
why are you selling me?

We did, except
our farm can never make enough
even if grain prices doubled every year
it wouldn't be enough

What?

We had to lie to you
the debt this community is under has lasted for...
generations
before you, before me.
you aren't our first Emma
and you won't be our last.
Thats why we had you and Annabelle in the first place...

Annabelle! Run!
Run! Get away!
They're coming to take us!

*vans appear*
*Annabelle runs*

No!
God damn it Emma.

...so all this was for nothing
what am I to this world?
a mass of flesh and bone
turned into money
the most useless thing in the world
